Authors:
M. Amalia Scataglini, Osvaldo Morrone, Liliana M. Giussani,
Silvia Suyai Denham, Fernando O. Zuloaga
Title:
Phylogeny of Paspalum (Poaceae, Paniceae) based on
chloroplast and nuclear markers
Abstract:
We present a phylogenetic analysis of 131 species of
Paspalum and related genera based on both chloroplast and nuclear
markers. A total of 115 species of Paspalum were sampled, including taxa
of all 4 subgenera considered. Anachyris, Ceresia, Harpostachys, and
Paspalum, with 27 of the 28 informal groups in the latter subgenus
analyzed. Monophyly of the subgenera, and informal groups, is discussed
and related to morphological, cytological and anatomical evidence. The
inclusion of related genera, i.e., Reimarochloa, Spheneria and
Thrasyopsis, in Paspalum is also discussed.
